summary: The video discusses a man named Anthony Lofredo from Montpellier, France, who refers to himself as 'Black Alien.' He began his transformation at the age of 27 to appear less human, claiming he feels more complete after amputating his own fingers. He has undergone extensive modifications, including tattoos covering his entire body, numerous cosmetic surgeries (such as tongue, nose, ear, and finger removal), and even dyeing his teeth black and changing the color of his eye whites. He also mentions having silicone implants. Anthony justifies his actions by stating that one must know what they want, have the courage to say it, and the energy to execute it. Sources suggest his next steps involve leg amputations and extreme weight loss. The narrator questions how he will look upon completing his transformation and why no one stops him, despite clear self-harm. Anthony counters by saying he has the freedom to live the life he chooses, though he does face challenges like being asked to leave certain public places.
